QuestData.Title: Twisted Corruptors
QuestData.Description:
While the fleshbeasts that accompany the invading forces appear to be no more than a nuisance, they carry within themselves a deep connection to the corrupting powers of the Old Gods.
Like a pestilence, they spread the N'Zoth's corruption wherever they tread, slowly twisting the very land to their form.
They must be eradicated.
